indication: Throbbing, pulsating headache with flushed face and dilated pupils. Pain comes and goes suddenly. Violent headache with heat.
agg: Worse from light, noise, jar, stooping, afternoon 3PM, drafts, sun exposure
amel: Better from pressure, quiet, dark room, bending head backward, cold applications

indication: Bursting, splitting headache. Any motion aggravates. Wants to lie perfectly still. Headache with constipation.
agg: Worse from any motion, warmth, morning, coughing, stooping
amel: Better from pressure, rest, lying on painful side, cool open air, closing eyes

indication: Dull, heavy headache with heavy drooping eyelids. Band-like sensation around head. Occipital headache spreading to forehead.
agg: Worse from mental effort, smoking, heat of sun, humid weather, emotions
amel: Better from urination, open air, continued motion, stimulants

indication: Headache as from many hammers. Migraine from sunrise to sunset. Bursting headache with zigzag visual disturbances.
agg: Worse from sun, reading, grief, 10-11 AM, noise, menses
amel: Better from cold applications, lying in dark room, perspiration, sleep

indication: Headache from overwork, alcohol, coffee. Congestive headache with vertigo. Feels brain pressing out. Morning headache.
agg: Worse from morning, mental exertion, alcohol, coffee, sun, opening eyes
amel: Better from rest, warmth, strong pressure, evening, wrapping head

indication: Grief, disappointment, silent brooding. Sighing. Mood swings. Globus hystericus. Ailments from grief and worry.
agg: Worse from grief, worry, tobacco smoke, coffee, consolation, emotions
amel: Better from change of position, eating, deep breathing, being alone

indication: Extreme anxiety about health with restlessness. Fear of death. Fastidious. Anxiety worse at midnight and after 1AM.
agg: Worse after midnight 1-2AM, cold, alone, exertion
amel: Better from warmth, warm drinks, company, motion, sitting upright

dose: 3-5 pellets every 15-30 min in acute panic
indication: Sudden intense fear of death. Panic attacks. Extreme restlessness and anxiety. Ailments from fright or shock.
agg: Worse from fright, shock, cold dry wind, night, warm room, rising from bed
amel: Better from open air, rest, warm perspiration

indication: Anxiety about health, especially stomach and heart. Fears being alone. Sympathetic nature. Fears thunderstorms.
agg: Worse from alone, twilight, thunderstorms, warm food, lying on left side
amel: Better from sleep, eating, cold drinks, massage, company

indication: Dry, hacking cough with stitching chest pain. Must hold chest when coughing. Thirst for large quantities.
agg: Worse from motion, deep breathing, eating, warm room, morning
amel: Better from rest, lying on painful side, pressure on chest, cold drinks

indication: Dry, tickling cough worse from cold air and talking. Tightness in chest. Rust-colored sputum. Burning in chest.
agg: Worse from cold air, talking, laughing, evening, lying on left side
amel: Better from sleep, cold drinks, eating, open air

indication: Rattling cough with much mucus but cannot expectorate. Drowsiness. Respiration rapid and short. Loose rattling.
agg: Worse from lying down, evening, warm room, damp cold weather
amel: Better from sitting up, expectoration, cold open air, lying on right side

indication: Suffocative cough with rattling in chest. Constant nausea with respiratory complaints. Wheezing. Clean tongue despite nausea.
agg: Worse from warm moist weather, lying down, periodically
amel: Better from open air, rest, cold drinks

indication: Dry, barking, croupy cough. Like sawing through wood. Wakes with sensation of suffocation. Croup before midnight.
agg: Worse before midnight, cold wind, talking, swallowing, lying with head low
amel: Better from eating, drinking, warm drinks, sitting up, bending forward

indication: Indigestion from overindulgence. Nausea in morning. Constipation with ineffectual urging. Irritable stomach.
agg: Worse from morning, overeating, alcohol, coffee, spicy foods, cold
amel: Better from rest, warmth, evening, unbroken sleep, moist heat

indication: Food poisoning. Violent vomiting and diarrhea simultaneously. Burning pains in stomach relieved by heat. Extreme weakness.
agg: Worse from cold food/drinks, after midnight, spoiled food
amel: Better from heat, warm drinks, milk, sitting upright

indication: Bloating immediately after eating even small amounts. Gas. Hunger but fullness after few bites. Desire for sweets.
agg: Worse 4-8 PM, after eating, oysters, flatulent foods, right side
amel: Better from warm drinks, belching, motion, loose clothing, open air

indication: Excessive gas and bloating. Eructations give temporary relief. Coldness with desire to be fanned. Slow digestion.
agg: Worse from fatty food, wine, warm damp weather, evening
amel: Better from fanning, eructations, cold air, elevation

indication: Profuse, gushing, painless diarrhea. Early morning diarrhea driving out of bed. Followed by weakness. Offensive stool.
agg: Worse early morning 5-10 AM, hot weather, teething, eating, drinking
amel: Better from lying on abdomen, external warmth, rubbing right hypochondrium

indication: Stiffness in legs and hips worse on first motion, better from continued movement. Restless legs at night. Sciatica.
agg: Worse on first motion, rest, cold wet weather, night, overexertion
amel: Better from continued motion, warmth, rubbing, stretching, walking

indication: Twitching, jerking, cramps in calves and legs from emotional grief. Restless legs. Numbness and weakness.
agg: Worse from slight touch, consolation, coffee, tobacco, emotions
amel: Better from change of position, lying down, deep breathing

indication: Sciatica with violent cramping pains shooting down the leg. Better from hard pressure and bending double.
agg: Worse from anger, vexation, light touch, extending leg, lying on painless side
amel: Better from hard pressure, bending double, warmth, coffee

dose: Dissolve in hot water, sip frequently
indication: Cramps in calves, especially at night. Right-sided leg pains. Neuralgic pains relieved by warmth and pressure.
agg: Worse from cold, night, light touch, straightening leg
amel: Better from heat, hot applications, pressure, bending double, rubbing

indication: Lower back stiffness and pain worse from rest and first motion. Lumbago. Must keep moving for relief.
agg: Worse from rest, first motion, cold damp weather, sitting, lying
amel: Better from continued motion, warmth, lying on hard surface, stretching

indication: Sharp stitching back pains worse from any movement. Must lie perfectly still. Wants to lie on painful side.
agg: Worse from any motion, breathing deeply, coughing, warmth
amel: Better from lying on painful side, rest, pressure, cool applications

indication: Stitching back pains extending to legs. Weakness in back. Must sit to support back. Better from pressure.
agg: Worse 2-4 AM, cold, drafts, lying on affected side
amel: Better from warmth, sitting forward, motion, pressure

indication: Itching skin worse from heat of bed and bathing. Burning red eruptions. Dirty looking skin. Useful in chronic skin conditions.
agg: Worse from warmth of bed, bathing, washing, 11 AM, standing, alcohol
amel: Better from dry warm weather, lying on right side, drawing up limbs

indication: Eczema with thick, honey-like, sticky discharge. Cracks in skin folds. Behind ears. Unhealthy, rough skin.
agg: Worse from cold, during menses, warmth of bed, night
amel: Better from dark room, wrapping up, walking in open air

indication: Dry, rough, scaly skin. Burning itching relieved by heat. Psoriasis. Skin looks like parchment. Anxiety about skin.
agg: Worse from cold, scratching, after midnight, wet weather
amel: Better from heat, warm applications, warm drinks

indication: Vesicular eruptions with intense itching. Herpes. Urticaria. Red, swollen skin with burning and itching.
agg: Worse from cold wet weather, rest, scratching, night
amel: Better from very warm applications, continued motion, warm dry weather

indication: Sudden high fever after exposure to cold dry wind. Intense thirst. Fear and restlessness. Dry burning heat.
agg: Worse at night (especially midnight), in warm room, rising from bed
amel: Better from open air, rest, warm perspiration

indication: High sudden fever with flushed face, dilated pupils. Throbbing heat. Delirium with fever. No thirst during fever.
agg: Worse from light, noise, jar, afternoon 3 PM, drafts, lying down
amel: Better from semi-erect position, dark quiet room, pressure

dose: Dissolve 4 tablets under tongue every 2 hours
indication: First stages of fever with gradual onset. Flushed face but not as intense as Belladonna. Susceptibility to colds.
agg: Worse at night 4-6 AM, motion, right side, touch
amel: Better from cold applications, lying down, rest

indication: Flu with weakness and heaviness. No thirst. Chills up and down spine. Heavy drooping eyelids. Aching muscles.
agg: Worse before thunderstorm, damp weather, bad news, emotions
amel: Better from urination, continued motion, open air, stimulants

indication: Sore throat with excessive salivation. Metallic taste. Offensive breath. Ulcers on tongue and tonsils. Night sweats.
agg: Worse at night, sweating, extremes of temperature, drafts
amel: Better from moderate temperature, rest

indication: Left-sided sore throat or starts left goes right. Cannot bear anything touching throat. Worse after sleep.
agg: Worse after sleep, hot drinks, empty swallowing, touch, tight collar
amel: Better from warm applications, eating, cold drinks, discharges

indication: Splinter-like pain in throat. Tonsillitis with suppuration. Extremely sensitive to cold and drafts. Irritable.
agg: Worse from cold air, drafts, touch, uncovering, lying on painful side
amel: Better from warmth, warm wrapping, damp weather

indication: Bright red, swollen tonsils. Throat dry despite no thirst. Right-sided sore throat. Constricted sensation.
agg: Worse from swallowing liquids, drafts, touch, talking, afternoon 3 PM
amel: Better from semi-sitting position, rest, dark quiet room

indication: Thick, stringy, ropy nasal discharge. Post-nasal drip. Pressure at root of nose. Green crusts. Sinus headache.
agg: Worse in morning, hot weather, after eating, beer
amel: Better from heat, motion, pressure

indication: Thick, bland, yellow-green discharge. Nose stuffed indoors, runs outdoors. Loss of smell. Worse in warm room.
agg: Worse in warm room, evening, lying down, rich fatty foods
amel: Better in open air, cold applications, gentle motion, consolation

indication: Thin, watery, burning discharge that excoriates upper lip. Sneezing without relief. Hay fever. Stuffed nose with discharge.
agg: Worse from cold, after midnight, right side
amel: Better from warmth, warm drinks, hot applications to nose

indication: Otitis media with thick yellow-green discharge. Worse at night. Ears feel stopped. Child weepy, wants fresh air.
agg: Worse at night, warm room, lying on affected side, rich foods
amel: Better from cold applications, open air, walking slowly, consolation

indication: Sudden acute ear infection. Throbbing pain. External ear red and hot. Child screams and is irritable. High fever.
agg: Worse from noise, jar, cold drafts, afternoon 3 PM, touch
amel: Better from semi-upright position, warm applications, rest

indication: Earache in teething children. Unbearable pain. One cheek red, one pale. Extremely irritable. Nothing satisfies.
agg: Worse at night, anger, teething, wind, warm room
amel: Better from being carried, cold applications, warm wet weather

indication: Conjunctivitis with copious purulent discharge. Corneal ulcers. Photophobia. Eyes look swollen and red.
agg: Worse from warmth, at night, sweets, emotional anticipation
amel: Better from cool air, cold applications, pressure, bathing

indication: Styes. Conjunctivitis with thick yellow-green discharge. Itching and burning. Lids glued together in morning.
agg: Worse in warm room, evening, twilight, rich food, fatty foods
amel: Better from cold applications, open air, motion, sympathy

indication: Acrid, burning tears. Bland nasal discharge. Eyes water constantly. Photophobia. Red, swollen conjunctiva.
agg: Worse in open air, light, warmth, evening, windy weather
amel: Better in dark room, wiping eyes, blinking, coffee

indication: Bearing down sensation as if everything would escape through vagina. Indifference to loved ones. Better from vigorous exercise.
agg: Worse before/during menses, morning, pregnancy, cold air
amel: Better from vigorous exercise, warmth, eating, pressure, occupation

indication: Delayed, scanty, changeable menses. PMS with weepiness. Better in open air. Thick bland discharge.
agg: Worse from warmth, rich foods, puberty, pregnancy, twilight
amel: Better from open air, motion, cold applications, sympathy, crying

indication: Menopausal hot flashes. Jealousy and suspicion. Cannot bear tight clothing. All symptoms worse after sleep.
agg: Worse after sleep, menopause, suppressed menses, spring, touch
amel: Better from onset of flow, discharges, open air, cold drinks

indication: Intense burning, cutting pain during urination. Constant urge to urinate. Urine passed drop by drop. Cystitis.
agg: Worse during urination, before urination, touch, coffee, cold drinks
amel: Better from warmth, rest, rubbing

indication: Burning and stinging pain in urethra. Scanty urine. Last drops burn. Kidney pain. No thirst despite fever.
agg: Worse from heat, touch, pressure, right side, afternoon 3 PM
amel: Better from cold applications, open air, uncovering, motion

indication: Honeymoon cystitis. UTI after catheterization or surgery. Burning in urethra between urinations. Suppressed emotions.
agg: Worse from sexual excess, anger held in, touch, tobacco
amel: Better from warmth, rest, after breakfast

indication: Teething with extreme irritability. One cheek red, one pale. Green diarrhea. Only wants to be carried.
agg: Worse from teething, anger, night, coffee, wind, warm room
amel: Better from being carried, warm wet weather, sweating

indication: Worm symptoms - grinding teeth at night, picking nose, ravenous appetite or refuses food. Very irritable child.
agg: Worse from touch, staring at objects, full moon, night
amel: Better from motion, lying on abdomen during sleep

indication: Slow development. Delayed teething, walking, talking. Sweaty head during sleep. Craves eggs. Chubby, fair child.
agg: Worse from cold, wet weather, work, exertion, milk, full moon
amel: Better from dry weather, lying on painful side, sneezing

indication: Fear of downward motion - baby cries when laid down. Mouth ulcers (thrush). Startles at slight noises.
agg: Worse from downward motion, sudden noise, warm weather, fruit
amel: Better from pressure, cold weather, evening

indication: Sleeplessness from mental activity. Mind racing with ideas. Oversensitive to noise, pain. Cannot switch off mind.
agg: Worse from excessive joy, strong emotions, noise, odors, at night
amel: Better from warmth, lying down, holding ice in mouth

indication: Wakes at 3-4 AM with thoughts of work. Cannot fall back asleep until dawn then oversleeps. Irritable on waking.
agg: Worse in morning, after eating, mental work, stimulants, 3-4 AM
amel: Better from rest, warmth, evening, damp weather, strong pressure

indication: Wakes after midnight with anxiety. Restless sleep with tossing and turning. Fear of death keeping awake.
agg: Worse after midnight 1-3 AM, alone, cold, lying down
amel: Better from warmth, sitting up, company, warm drinks

indication: Burning sensations everywhere. Offensive discharges. Philosopher type. Aversion to bathing. Standing aggravates.
agg: Worse from warmth of bed, bathing, standing, 11 AM, alcohol
amel: Better from dry warm weather, lying on right side, fresh air

indication: Collapse with air hunger. Wants to be fanned. Cold breath but burning internally. Exhaustion and weakness.
agg: Worse from warm damp weather, evening, lying down, wine, fatty food
amel: Better from fanning, eructations, being elevated, cold, loose clothing

indication: Debility from loss of fluids. Mental exhaustion before physical. Apathy, indifference. Hair falling out.
agg: Worse from loss of fluids, grief, sexual excess, drafts
amel: Better from warmth, short sleep, quiet

indication: Weakness from loss of fluids (blood, sweat, diarrhea). Periodical symptoms. Bloating not relieved by belching.
agg: Worse from loss of fluids, touch, drafts, every other day, fruit
amel: Better from hard pressure, bending double, warmth, loose clothing

indication: Shoulder stiffness worse on first motion. Tennis elbow. Carpal tunnel. Pain relieved by continued movement.
agg: Worse on first motion, rest, cold wet weather, night, overexertion
amel: Better from continued motion, warmth, rubbing, hot bath, stretching

indication: Shoulder and arm pain worse from any motion. Hot swollen joints. Must keep arm perfectly still.
agg: Worse from any motion, warmth, touch, morning
amel: Better from rest, lying on painful side, pressure, cold applications

indication: Cold, clammy hands. Writer's cramp. Weak wrists. Numbness of fingers. Joint problems in fair, flabby persons.
agg: Worse from cold, wet weather, work, mental exertion, standing
amel: Better from dry weather, lying on painful side, constipation

indication: Palpitations from constricting clothing. Left-sided heart symptoms. Worse after sleep. Cannot tolerate tight clothes.
agg: Worse after sleep, touch, pressure, hot drinks, spring, left side
amel: Better from warm applications, discharges, loose clothing, open air

indication: Palpitations with anxiety. Sensation of warmth in heart region. Bleeding tendency. Worse lying on left side.
agg: Worse from lying on left side, evening, thunderstorm, being alone
amel: Better from cold drinks, eating, sleep, open air, rubbing

indication: Slow, weak pulse. Sensation heart will stop if moved. Bluish face. Dropsy. Worse from sitting upright.
agg: Worse from sitting up, motion, music, sexual excess
amel: Better from lying down flat, empty stomach, fresh air

indication: Right-sided migraine. Starts at occiput, settles over right eye. Periodical headaches. Better from vomiting.
agg: Worse from right side, sun, periodically, during menopause, fasting
amel: Better from sleep, lying down, vomiting, pressure, in dark room

indication: Left-sided neuralgic headache. Severe pain in and around left eye. Pain follows course of sun - starts morning, peaks noon.
agg: Worse from motion, noise, touch, jarring, stooping
amel: Better from lying on right side with head high, steady pressure

indication: Persistent nausea not relieved by vomiting. Clean tongue. Excessive salivation with nausea. Vomiting of food and bile.
agg: Worse from vomiting, warmth, moist warm wind, overeating
amel: Better from open air, rest, closing eyes

indication: Violent vomiting and diarrhea together. Cold sweat on forehead. Collapse, pallor. Cramping pains in abdomen.
agg: Worse from cold drinks, exertion, before menses, fright
amel: Better from warmth, hot drinks, lying down, covering, walking

indication: Severe cramping abdominal pain. Must bend double for relief. Colic after anger. Waves of pain.
agg: Worse from anger, eating, drinking, lying on painless side
amel: Better from hard pressure, bending double, warmth, coffee

indication: Violent spasmodic cough. Whooping cough. Deep barking cough. Cough worse after midnight. Holds chest when coughing.
agg: Worse after midnight, lying down, warmth, talking, laughing
amel: Better from open air, walking, sitting up, pressure

indication: Tickling, teasing cough from tickling in throat pit. Must cover mouth when breathing cold air. Incessant dry cough.
agg: Worse from cold air, uncovering, change of room temperature, night
amel: Better from covering mouth, warm air, warm drinks

indication: Urticaria - hives with stinging, burning. Edematous swelling. Worse from heat. No thirst. Bee sting-like symptoms.
agg: Worse from heat, touch, pressure, afternoon, right side
amel: Better from cold applications, open air, uncovering, cool bathing

indication: Itching, burning hives. Stinging nettle sensation. Worse from touch. Useful in allergic skin reactions, rashes.
agg: Worse from touch, cold bathing, exercise, yearly
amel: Better from rubbing, lying down

indication: Warts, especially cauliflower-like. Oily skin. Ill effects of vaccination. Condylomata. Moles. Skin growths.
agg: Worse from cold damp, night, 3 AM, after vaccination, onions
amel: Better from warmth, wrapping, sneezing, drawing up limbs

indication: Fever with intense restlessness and anxiety. Burning heat but wants warmth. Thirst for small sips. Weakness.
agg: Worse after midnight 1-2 AM, cold, alone, exertion
amel: Better from warmth, warm drinks, company, sitting up

indication: Septic fevers. Typhoid states. Rapid prostration. Offensive discharges. Confused, feels scattered, falls asleep mid-sentence.
agg: Worse from humid heat, fog, pressure, walking, open air
amel: Better from walking continually, quiet, company

indication: Chronic deep grief held in. Dwells on past hurts. Unable to cry in front of others. Worse from consolation.
agg: Worse from consolation, sun, heat, seaside, 10-11 AM, grief
amel: Better from open air, cold bathing, tight clothing, going without meals

indication: Suppressed anger and indignation. Ailments from being humiliated. Sweet disposition hides inner rage.
agg: Worse from anger (especially suppressed), indignation, sexual excess
amel: Better from warmth, rest, breakfast, expressing emotions

indication: Lack of confidence despite intellectual capacity. Fear of failure. Anticipatory anxiety. Irritable with family.
agg: Worse 4-8 PM, warm room, tight clothing, anticipation
amel: Better from warm drinks, motion, eating small amounts, belching

indication: Gouty pains ascending from feet upward. Cold to touch but better from cold applications. Stiffness in joints.
agg: Worse from warmth, motion, night, warm bed
amel: Better from cold, ice water, rest, cold applications

indication: Restless legs at night. Burning in knees. Better from damp weather (unusual). Progressive weakness of legs.
agg: Worse from dry cold wind, clear fine weather, coffee
amel: Better from damp wet weather, warmth of bed, cold drinks

indication: Coccyx pain especially after injury. Shooting pains along spine. Nerve pain in back. Tailbone sensitivity.
agg: Worse from touch, cold, damp, fog, exertion, closed room
amel: Better from bending head backward, rubbing

indication: Sacral and hip pain extending to legs. Worse from stooping. Back gives out when walking. Hemorrhoids.
agg: Worse from standing, walking, stooping, after stool, morning on waking
amel: Better from cool open air, continued exertion, kneeling

indication: Streaming watery eyes and nose. Acrid nasal discharge, bland tears (opposite of Euphrasia). Sneezing. Hay fever.
agg: Worse in warm room, evening, spring, damp weather
amel: Better in open air, cold room

indication: Ear infection with splinter-like pains. Yellow thick offensive discharge. Very sensitive to cold and touch.
agg: Worse from cold, drafts, touch, night, lying on painful side
amel: Better from warmth, wrapping up head, damp weather

indication: Dark red, swollen throat. Pain shoots to ears on swallowing. Tonsillitis. Cannot swallow hot drinks.
agg: Worse from hot drinks, swallowing, cold damp weather, motion
amel: Better from rest, cold drinks, dry weather

indication: Aphthous ulcers. Thrush. White patches in mouth. Mouth ulcers that bleed when touched. Hot mouth.
agg: Worse from downward motion, sudden noise, fruit, warm weather
amel: Better from pressure, cold weather

indication: Croup with rattling, choking cough. Sensitive to drafts. Yellow loose cough. Cough from uncovering.
agg: Worse from cold air, cold drinks, drafts, touch, night, morning
amel: Better from warmth, warm drinks, damp weather, wrapping up

indication: Irregular menses. Vaginal dryness. Aversion to sex. Infertility from grief. Headaches during menses.
agg: Worse from sun, consolation, seashore, 10-11 AM, heat
amel: Better from open air, cold bathing, going without meals, sweating

indication: Severe menstrual cramps. The more pain, the more flow. Depression during menses. Neck and back stiffness.
agg: Worse from cold, damp, menses, emotions, labor
amel: Better from warmth, wrapping up, eating, gentle motion

indication: Enlarged prostate. Difficulty starting urination. Frequent urging at night. Cold feeling in prostate area.
agg: Worse from cold, damp weather, sympathy
amel: Better from warmth

indication: Cannot tolerate milk - immediate vomiting. Exhaustion after vomiting. Weak, pale child. Summer diarrhea in children.
agg: Worse from milk, heat of summer, morning, evening
amel: Better from open air, company

indication: Lack of vital heat. Offensive foot sweat. Helps expel foreign bodies. Chronic suppuration. Delicate, refined appearance.
agg: Worse from cold, drafts, new moon, uncovering, vaccination
amel: Better from warmth, wrapping head, summer, magnetism

indication: Slow metabolism. Chilly. Easy exhaustion. Head sweats at night. Sour discharges. Anxiety about health.
agg: Worse from cold, wet, exertion, ascending, full moon, milk
amel: Better from dry weather, lying on painful side, rubbing
